script: Guys, I’m standing on a bridge in Bern, and the turquoise river and green hills are absolutely breathtaking today!
Just minutes later, I hopped onto a bright red train that rattled up the snowy viaduct.

Flying over the valley, I marveled at the emerald carpet below. A silver waterfall cascades down a jagged cliff, roaring like a drum. Tiny villages dot the landscape, their roofs catching the sunrise glow. I felt mist kiss my cheeks, and my heart raced with wonder. This scene will stay with me.
Rising above, I saw water reflect Matterhorn.
I stepped onto the old wooden planks, heart racing.
The view from above unfurled like a postcard.
